resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
-:: Profile ::-\nUse this feature to view your profile details like name, mobile number, address, etc.
-:: Attendance ::-\nIn attendance feature, you can view your own attendance datewise. You can see your login and logout details each day you have used the app for attendance.

-:: Location ::-\nLocation feature provides your real time location on google map. You can see the real time tracking of your location in the form of red dots. If you are not using the app for attendance then you can see the last login location.
-:: Settings ::-\nIn settings, you can change the font size of the app for easy view of the app items as per your choice.

-:: Login ::-\nLogin button makes login of your app, that is, it registers your attendance along with the location and time. The same button turns as Logout after login. If you want to stop use of the app, or wish to register your signout, your can check this same button labeled as Logout. After loguot, the same button will again turn out to be Login, so that you can login again.
